Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Soldier', 3: "He doesn't seem to... Want to attack the nun?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'On the battered mechanic hand of the Corrupted hangs a human arm, which had hooked onto the metal of his clothing when it was torn off.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the hand of the arm, is a combat knife.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bruce', 3: "...We must ensure the civilians' safety before our own, save as many lives as possible. If there really are survivors in the church waiting for help...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Girl', 3: 'Father Snow once said that no matter their beliefs, as long as they need help, we will help... I was abandoned in the snow as a child and was raised by the father.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Girl', 3: 'I have sinned... For which I will atone for... And now... I must sin once more...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'On this plain of pure white, the snow covers all in time.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's not your fault. You were... very brave. You don't need to apologize."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Let them become your power to carry on.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'That is... what that brave soldier, Bruce, once said.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'And also stuff like... "I\'m not going to die, I\'m going so that fewer people die."'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Always drowning me in these... lies... That idiot... You didn't have to go and..."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...Dammit. Now it's my turn to take action, huh?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Come on, you still have people waiting for your guidance, and I... still have to finish our mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I can't always let that brave soldier be ahead of me...", 4: '1'}
